item.title: DeepVD: Toward Class-Separation Features for Neural Network Vulnerability Detection
item.description: The advances of machine learning (ML) including deep learning (DL) have enabled several approaches to implicitly learn vulnerable code patterns to automatically detect software vulnerabilities.

item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Coders at work
item.description: 最近看了这本书：Coders at Work（中文名：《编程人生》），着实有趣，摘录一些我喜欢的段落分享一下。
